title: Get the Microsoft Surface Duo 2 for $250 off today
content:
The original Microsoft Surface Duo wasn’t the best phone around, even though it had two displays, thanks to its plentiful software bugs and older hardware. The company fixed many of those issues with the Surface Duo 2, which arrived near the end of last year, and now you can get the Duo 2 on sale

The post Get the Microsoft Surface Duo 2 for $250 off today appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The Microsoft Surface Duo 2 is $250 off today at Best Buy, in both the 128GB and 256GB storage options. In-store pickup is also available.
